com.fxgraph.graph

Class Arrow

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.Group
          • com.fxgraph.graph.Arrow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class Arrow
extends javafx.scene.Group
    A straight arrow, composed of a main line and a fin line connected to either side of the end point.
    See Also:
    stackoverflow answer that this class is derived from.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Arrow()
      Convenience constructor for Arrow(Line, Line, Line) with three empty Line constructors.
      Arrow(javafx.scene.shape.Line line, javafx.scene.shape.Line arrow1, javafx.scene.shape.Line arrow2)
      Convenience constructor for Arrow(Line, Line, Line, double, double), with default arrow length and arrow width.
      Arrow(javafx.scene.shape.Line line, javafx.scene.shape.Line arrow1, javafx.scene.shape.Line arrow2, double arrowLength, double arrowWidth)

        private final javafx.scene.shape.Line line

    • Constructor Detail

      • Arrow

        public Arrow()
        Convenience constructor for Arrow(Line, Line, Line) with three empty Line constructors.

      • Arrow

        public Arrow(javafx.scene.shape.Line line,
             javafx.scene.shape.Line arrow1,
             javafx.scene.shape.Line arrow2)
        Convenience constructor for Arrow(Line, Line, Line, double, double), with default arrow length and arrow width.
        Parameters:
        line - Central main line.
        arrow1 - First fin line.
        arrow2 - Second fin line.

      • Arrow

        public Arrow(javafx.scene.shape.Line line,
             javafx.scene.shape.Line arrow1,
             javafx.scene.shape.Line arrow2,
             double arrowLength,
             double arrowWidth)
        Parameters:
        line - Central main line.
        arrow1 - First fin line, whose end points will be updated depending on the arrow dimensions and the direction of the main line.
        arrow2 - Second fin line, similar to the first.
        arrowLength - The length of each arrow line.
        arrowWidth - The width of the arrow (distance between the main line and a fin line).
